feed.title: Comments on BGIedu Students Post for Blog Action Day on Food
feed.subtitle:
Today is Blog Action Day, where each year a topic is chosen and bloggers and activists worldwide write about that topic in their blogs or post about it on Twitter and Facebook using the tags #FOOD and #BAD11.
This year's topic is Food, and this year many of my students of my BGIedu class Using the Social Web for Social Change are using the day to help kick off their "Beat Blog" assignments.
(Blog continues with a list of student blogs...)
